title: Here’s an early look at what could be Google Pay’s upcoming “Wallet” interface
content:
In an interview this January, Google’s Bill Ready shared plans to make Google Pay a more “comprehensive digital wallet” with support for digital tickets, airline passes, vaccine passports, and more. Although Google hasn’t shared any official information on this change since the interview, we now have access to screenshots of what could be Google Pay’s

The post Here’s an early look at what could be Google Pay’s upcoming “Wallet” interface appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google is working on making Google Pay a more comprehensive digital wallet. Here's an early look at what could be the updated Wallet interface.
